titleStmt.title: A brief advertisement concerning East-New-Jersey, in America.
titleStmt.author: Scot, George, d. 1685.
Perth, James Drummond, Earl of, 1648-1716.

notesStmt.note: Author and imprint suggested by Wing.
Includes text of a pass issued by the Earl of Perth to George Scot.
Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
